title: F. F. Baker stamped backs T206's wanted
author: 2dueces

posts.post_title: F. F. Baker stamped backs T206's wanted
posts.post_content:
Sorry to beat this drum again, but for new members who don't know I'm collecting all Baker stamped T206's. PM me or email me if you have any or see any listed on eBay. I have to great members here Eric and Ed that alert me everytime they see one. Without them I wouldn't have 12 in my collection. Thanks guys and thanks in advance for anyone that helps. I have a few T206's to trade or will buy if you have any. Thanks again, joe
[url]Twodueces22@yahoo.com[/url]
